info.description: OpenAPI 3.0 Specification for the REST-API backend of the Amazon EC2 Hosted ML Model
info.title: Swagger API - Bentley Assignment

get.description:
Press the `Try it out` button below to test out sample data against the backend REST API.

*Notes:*

**GET:** Used in this demo only; OpenAPI 3.0 standards no longer supports body requests for GET. Returns: `STRING`

**POST:** Used by the front-end service; will pass in parameters via POST. Returns: `JSON`

parameters.description: Name of a Building on the Main NIH Campus that is the location of work for an employee.
parameters.name: building

parameters.description: The total amount of peer-reviewed publications held by an employee.
parameters.name: num_publications

parameters.description: The total amount of NIH-sanctioned conferences attended by an employee.
parameters.name: num_conferences

parameters.description: The classification of an employee as either 'Parttime' or 'Fulltime' (40 hours/week).
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: The official salutation of an employee; may correspond to educational level.
parameters.name: title

parameters.description: The specific field of expertise held by an employee.
parameters.name: expertise

parameters.description: One of the 27 Institutes of the National Institutes of Health where the employee works.
parameters.name: institute

parameters.description: The total amount of Postdoctoral Fellows that an employee oversees.
parameters.name: num_postdocs

parameters.description: The total amount of individuals (contractors and Federal workers) overseen by the employee.
parameters.name: num_reports

200.description: The output values of the request

get.summary: Click here to test out sample data.
